extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of critical infrastructure?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches for Internet-Facing Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Apply patches for internet-facing systems within a risk-informed span of time. Prioritize patching critical assets, known exploited vulnerabilities, and vulnerabilities in appliances known to be frequently exploited by Volt Typhoon.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Internet Exposure of Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Decrease the attack surface by not exposing systems or management interfaces to the internet when not necessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement and Enforce Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Change default passwords and ensure they meet the policy requirements for complexity. Implement a policy that requires passwords to be at least 15 characters and does not allow reuse.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Phishing-Resistant MFA
extracted_playbook.description: Implement phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication for access to assets.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct Regular Security Assessments
extracted_playbook.description: Use third-party assessments to validate current system and network security compliance via security architecture reviews, penetration tests, bug bounties, attack surface management services, incident simulations, or table-top exercises.
